attributes.action: Protect the HS2 Part 2 planned alignment from future development.
attributes.additional_details:
I do not believe that the benefits of HS2 have been fully considered.  Also taking HS2 only half way -  to Birmingham will not give half the benefits, but much less.

Investment in High Speed Trains should continue.   e.g. Through trains from Birmingham and Manchester (and Leeds) to Paris and Brussels etc.
attributes.background:
Do not allow new roads, buildings etc. to block the already surveyed route for HS2 between Birmingham and Manchester.  (And East Midlands).

Keep options open so that High Speed Trains to the north can be reconsidered in the future.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: 

Keep compulsory purchased land for HS2 to Manchester: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648150

We have also published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Don't axe Birmingham-Manchester line of HS2: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644999
